about_the_game:
A cinematic experience from orbit to lunar landing — Use your wits and primary source documents to solve disasters based on what NASA actually faced.

We're bringing the equipment NASA used over 50 years ago back to life in carefully recreated spacecraft and mission command instruments — Use it all to work together, solve problems, and race to take humanity’s first steps on the moon.

A 15-20 minute ride to the moon for you and up to four friends with extensively researched equipment and history.
Experience the wonder and thrill of humanity's furthest adventure with an original cinematic soundtrack by Netflix composer Kevin Robles.

With the astronaut on PC, up to four mission commanders can join on any internet-enabled device for free. You only need ONE COPY of the game to play with up to five people.
